name: Mia S. McLeod
information: Daughter of the late James S. and Shirley J. McLeod
University of South Carolina, B.A., 1990, University of South Carolina School of Law, J.D., 1995
Office of South Carolina Attorney General, Director, Violence Against Women Act (VAWA) Project, 1997 - 1999
Adjunct Instructor, Management 250 - Professional Comm., University of South Carolina - Darla Moore School of Business, 1998 - 1999
Director, State Office of Victim Assistance, 1990 - 2001
Director of Governmental Affairs, South Carolina Department of Probation, Parole and Pardon Services, 2001 - 2002
Board of Directors, South Carolina Chamber of Commerce, 2007 - 2010
Member, Rice Creek School Improvement Council (SIC), Richland School District Two, 2003 - 2007, Chairman, 2003 - 2004
Co-Chairman, Richland School District Two Bond Referendum Campaign of 2008
bills: Caution Against Racially Exploitative Non-Emergencies (CAREN) Act
General Assembly Members; enact term limits
Many more that I don't have time to list
